title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 321 - Loans To Executive Officers And Directors Of Banks And Bank Holding Companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 321 - Loans To Executive Officers And Directors Of Banks And Bank Holding Companies

State Regulations
§ 321.1 - Definitions
§ 321.2 - General provisions
§ 321.3 - Loans to executive officers and directors
§ 321.4 - Additional restrictions on loans to executive officers
§ 321.5 - Reports of executive officers' indebtedness to other banks
§ 321.6 - Annual financial statements of directors
§ 321.7 - Loans to executive officers and directors of bank holding companies
§ 321.8 - Limitations on certain loans to executive officers and directors of stock-form savings banks and savings and loan associations
§ 321.9 - Compliance with federal regulation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 321

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§ 103[8], 130[5]-[6], 142[3][b], 143[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
